name: Prophour23
description: Prophour23 is a fast-paced, replayable real-time strategy. It's designed for short, quick plays. A single playthrough will take you about 15 minutes, if you're good. But the next one will be different. And another one as well.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.8GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: You have to protect a beating heart from a louse invasion by growing muscles, 'scream organs', and bones. It's gross and challenging. Best played in 5-10 minute spurts over days or weeks.
You have to protect a beating heart from a louse invasion by growing muscles, 'scream organs', and bones. It's gross and challenging. Best played in 5-10 minute spurts over days or weeks.
Dumb.  Extremely simplistic gameplay with vague mechanics and no real objectives.
The game is too big for me unplayable
